content:
I think I'll go with a shoe rack and individual shoe boxes for my dress shoes. I've had issues with my boots getting creased in the past, so I'll make sure to store them upright. Do you have any recommendations for a good shoe cleaning kit? I want to make sure I'm taking good care of my shoes.
(I mentioned the winter coat in the first message, and now I'm asking about shoe cleaning kits. I'm trying to keep the conversation flowing naturally.)
